lines.text: In this web page which I made, you can saw a description of this project and who to do it:ePortfolio Group 4 - 1ºBach. You can also see the following video.

guide.summary: This is a Alarm clock which wake us up with water and with a vibration under the pillow.
guide.title: Water Up
